info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 2:26AM MDT until September 04 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM MDT FOR EASTERN LIBERTY...HILL AND NORTHEASTERN CHOUTEAU COUNTIES... At 226 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 29 miles north of Joplin to 13 miles southeast of Inverness to 15 miles west of Big Sandy, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy, Azure, Beaver Creek, Inverness, St. Pierre, Gildford, Joplin, Sangrey, Boneau, Box Elder, Agency, Hingham, Rudyard, Rocky Boy, Laredo, Kenilworth, Kremlin and Simpson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
